dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, InvestyWise)

Q1_FY2026.notes: Total income Rs 2,486.39 cr vs Rs 2,044.27 cr in Q4 FY25. Net profit Rs 145.73 cr vs Rs 119.20 cr in Q4 FY25.

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue decreased 3.7% YoY to Rs 16.50 billion. Net profit fell 20.6% to Rs 413 million. EBITDA down 33.6% from Rs 870 million. EBITDA margin compressed from 5.08% to 3.51%.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Standalone revenue grew ~4% YoY. Standalone EBITDA surged ~47% YoY. Consolidated EBITDA grew 31.2% YoY.

FY2024.notes: Total revenue approximately Rs 6,332.67 cr in FY2024

keyRatios.notes: Company is debt-free. Strong balance sheet.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Debt-free company. Secured 30-year brand licensing deal with Whirlpool Corporation. Market cap around Rs 10,100 cr.

keyHighlights: Strong Q3 EBITDA recovery after weak Q2
